description: You are given two 0-indexed binary strings s1 and s2, both of length n, and a positive integer x. You can perform any of the following operations on the string s1 any number of times: Return the minimum cost needed to make the strings s1 and s2 equal, or return -1 if it is impossible. Note that flipping a character means changing it from 0 to 1 or vice-versa.
